AddDialog.CustomTorrentTitleHelperText: Write custom title to find poster
AddDialog.HashExists: This torrent is already in database

BufferNote: Set Preload Cache Before Play > 32 MB in settings to change preload size
CloseServer?: Do you want to turn off server?
Name: Name

PWAGuide.Description: Install the app on your device to easily access it anytime. No app store. No download.
PWAGuide.PlayerButtons: VLC and Infuse buttons will be added to open video instantly on the phone

SettingsDialog.CacheAfterReaderDesc: from cache will be loaded after currently played frame
SettingsDialog.CacheBeforeReaderDesc: from cache will be saved before currently played frame
SettingsDialog.DisableDHTHint: Disable if there is no network after starting the server
SettingsDialog.DisableUTPHint: Recommended to disable in Windows OS
SettingsDialog.EnableDebugHint: For developers. Don`t enable without need.
SettingsDialog.EnableIPv6Hint: Enable only if supported by ISP
SettingsDialog.EnableRutorSearch: Turn on torrents search by RuTor
SettingsDialog.EnableRutorSearchHint: You can search torrents by RuTor, even if the RuTor is not available. NOTE: The database takes about 500 MB of RAM.
SettingsDialog.ForceEncryptHint: Can help with torrent blocking providers
SettingsDialog.RemoveCacheOnDrop: Remove Cache from Disk on Drop Torrent
SettingsDialog.RemoveCacheOnDropDesc: If disabled, cache removed on delete torrent.
SettingsDialog.ResponsiveModeHint: Read torrent data as soon as possible for better streaming experience
SettingsDialog.RetrackersModeHint: Trackers modification mode when adding a new torrent
SettingsDialog.SettingsStorageHint: JSON is easier to edit/backup, BBolt is more robust.
SettingsDialog.ShowFSActiveTorr: Show only active torrents in the file system
SettingsDialog.ShowFSActiveTorrHint: When enabled, only active torrents are shown in the FS (FUSE, WebDAV, etc.). If disabled, all torrents will be displayed, which may cause simultaneous connections to all torrents when opening a category and slowdown.
SettingsDialog.StorageSettingsSaved: Settings saved! Restart application for changes to take effect.
SettingsDialog.UseDiskDesc: Better use RAM or external storage on flash-based devices
SettingsDialog.UseInfuse: Prompt to open video in Infuse
SettingsDialog.UseInfuseHint: Add Infuse player button to torrent content list
SettingsDialog.UseVLC: Prompt to open video in VLC
SettingsDialog.UseVLCHint: Add VLC player button to torrent content list
SettingsDialog.UseIINA: Prompt to open video in IINA
SettingsDialog.UseIINAHint: Add IINA player button to torrent content list (macOS only)
SettingsDialog.ViewedStorageHint: Choose where to store viewed history

ThanksToEveryone: Thanks to everyone who tested and helped!

Torznab.EnableSearchViaTorznab: Enable search via Torznab indexers (e.g. Jackett, Prowlarr)

TMDB.APIKeyHint: Enter your TMDB API key to enable movie poster search. Get one at https://www.themoviedb.org/settings/api
TMDB.APIURLHint: Base URL for TMDB API. API paths are added automatically (default: https://api.themoviedb.org)
TMDB.ImageURLHint: Base URL for TMDB images. Image paths are added automatically (default: https://image.tmdb.org)
TMDB.ImageURLRuHint: Alternative image URL for Russian users. Image paths are added automatically (default: https://imagetmdb.com)
